title: Attempting to Reconnect
body: Hi, since the ending of patch 7.7 going into 7.8, anytime i am playing in-game i tend to get "attempting to Reconnect" or the game freezes (disconnected - while still going on) or the game kicks me and i have to reconnect. i have to re-patch, check if there is any missing patches through the toolkit, as well as looking through my firewall. My friends and i play on the same network and they don't seem to be receiving the same issue as i am. can someone please help me? and it also affects me even in the client.

replies.body: Hi BROPORO, i've tried that still nothing, i even just finished uninstalling and reinstalling league, the issue is still there, this is getting unnerving.,

I had this last game this patch. My internet wasnt down! I double checked it sending a ping to google and opening diffrent internet pages but got kicked out of league and was unable to relog for 2 minutes in the early game then i got kicked out imedatly again and had to wait basicly another 2 minutes what ,meant for me i was lvl 2 and the enemy was lvl 6 and the enemy jgl also came to dive me. Pls fix this costed me 22 Lp ty

Hey guys, i found the problem, it has to do with punk buster, don't know when it got on my system or got activated, but after i stopped it from the back ground process in task manager, i played 2 games with no reconnecting issue. go to task manager and stop the background process "pnkbstra" ... if you dont have this running and you still get the prob then i don't know on that basis. gl on the rift!

That's pretty strange that some people on your network can get connected but you're unable to. With that being the case, it tells me that the main problem must lie somewhere in your own pc's settings, possibly your DNS or port forwarding. Be sure to hit all the steps [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure that we cover all our bases!

It may be strange but same for me.

This reconnect problem happen to me since last patch and is not about my internet because except lol all works fine, with no cuts or freezes. Normal navigation, downloads, streaming, ALL the other games I have installed... So the problem comes from lol after the patch.

And if I have to be accurate, I remember a live small update that I notice in the let upper icon (when the patch is downloading in blue) and after that my lol gets some probles like this "attempting to reconnect" and FPS "absurds" and nonsense drops time by time (maybe 3 of them in the same game, then noone in the next game, 5 in the next and so..)

So definitely and with all the people having the same problems its obvious we can say that the these problems comes after some league of legends patch/fix.
